title: 1888 Rafael Tuck & Sons Baseball COMPLETE SET Die Cut Scrap

posts.post_title: 1888 Rafael Tuck & Sons Baseball COMPLETE SET Die Cut Scrap
posts.post_content:
[URL="https://thecard.store/cards/1888-rafael-tuck-sons-baseball-complete-set-die-cut-scrap/"]Link[/URL]

1888 Rafael Tuck & Sons Baseball COMPLETE SET Die Cut Scrap - $1600 obo

Incredible shape with Base-Ball stick...all except NY player.  NY will need repair or replaced (or kept home from grading).

Fairly certain this is the first time these guys have seen the light of day in a century.  (NY looks like brittle-break from storage)
